00066 
00067 GradientDescent::GradientDescent(ObjectiveFunctional* newObjectiveFunctional)
00068 : TrainingAlgorithm(newObjectiveFunctional)
00069 {
00070    // Training operators
00071 
00072    trainRateMethod = BrentMethod;
00073 
00074    // Training parameters
00075 
00076    firstTrainRate = 1.0e-6;
00077    bracketingFactor = 2.0;
00078    trainRateTolerance = 1.0e-6;
00079 
00080    // Stopping criteria
00081 
00082    evaluationGoal = -1.0e99;
00083    gradientNormGoal = 0.0;
00084    maximumTime = 1.0e6;
00085    maximumNumberOfEpochs = 100;
00086 
00087    // User stuff
00088 
00089    warningTrainRate = 1.0e6;
00090    errorTrainRate = 1.0e12;
00091    displayPeriod = 25;
00092    
00093    reserveTrainingDirectionHistory = false;
00094    reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory = false;
00095    reserveTrainingRateHistory = false;
00096    
00097 }

00351 void GradientDescent::setFirstTrainRate(double newFirstTrainRate)
00352 {
00353    // Control sentence (if debug)
00354 
00355    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00356      
00357    if(newFirstTrainRate <= 0.0)
00358    {
00359       std::cerr << std::endl
00360                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
00361                 << "void setFirstTrainRate(double) method." << std::endl
00362                 << "First train rate must be greater than 0." << std::endl
00363                 << std::endl;
00364 
00365       exit(1);
00366    }
00367 
00368    #endif
00369 
00370    // Set first train rate
00371 
00372    firstTrainRate = newFirstTrainRate;

00613 // double calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>)
00614 // method
00615 
00626 
00627 double GradientDescent::calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate
00628 (double initialTrainRate, double evaluation, Vector<double> freeParameters, 
00629 Vector<double> trainDirection)
00630 {
00631    double trainRate = 0.0;
00632 
00633    // Multilayer perceptron
00634 
00635    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00636 
00637    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00638 
00639    Vector<double> potentialFreeParameters(numberOfFreeParameters);
00640 
00641    double a = 0.0;
00642    double evaluationA = 0.0;
00643    double b = 0.0;
00644    double evaluationB = 0.0;
00645 
00646    double c = 0.0;
00647    double evaluationC = 0.0;
00648    double d = 0.0;
00649    double evaluationD = 0.0;
00650 
00651    double tau = (3.0-sqrt(5.0))/2.0; // 0.382
00652 
00653    // Start golden section search
00654 
00655    // Set initial a point
00656 
00657    a = 0.0;
00658 
00659    // Calculate evaluation for a
00660 
00661    evaluationA = evaluation;
00662 
00663    // Set initial b point
00664 
00665    b = initialTrainRate;
00666 
00667    // Calculate evaluation for b
00668 
00669    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*b;
00670 
00671    evaluationB = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00672 
00673    // Find initial interval where minimum evaluation occurs
00674 
00675    while(evaluationA > evaluationB)
00676    {
00677       // Set new b
00678 
00679       b *= bracketingFactor;
00680 
00681       if(b >= errorTrainRate)
00682       {
00683          std::cerr << std::endl
00684                    << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
00685                    << "double calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate"
00686                    << "(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00687                    << "Unable to bracket a minimum." << std::endl;
00688                    
00689          exit(1);
00690       }
00691       else if(display && b >= warningTrainRate)
00692       {
00693          std::cout << std::endl
00694                    << "Flood Warning: Train rate is " << b
00695                    << std::endl;
00696       }
00697 
00698       // Calculate evaluation for new b
00699 
00700       potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*b;
00701 
00702       evaluationB = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00703    }
00704 
00705    // Initialize c and d (interior points for line minimization)
00706 
00707    // Initialize c point
00708 
00709    c = a + tau*(b-a);
00710 
00711    // Calculate evaluation for c
00712 
00713    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*c;
00714 
00715    evaluationC = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00716 
00717    // Initialize d point
00718 
00719    d = b - tau*(b-a);
00720 
00721    // Calculate evaluation for d
00722 
00723    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*d;
00724 
00725    evaluationD = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00726 
00727    // Reduce the interval with the golden section algorithm
00728 
00729    while(b-a > trainRateTolerance)
00730    {
00731       Vector<double> evaluationVectorLeft(3);
00732       evaluationVectorLeft[0] = evaluationA;
00733       evaluationVectorLeft[1] = evaluationC;
00734       evaluationVectorLeft[2] = evaluationD;
00735 
00736       double minimumEvaluationLeft = evaluationVectorLeft.calculateMinimum();
00737 
00738       Vector<double> evaluationVectorRight(3);
00739       evaluationVectorRight[0] = evaluationB;
00740       evaluationVectorRight[1] = evaluationC;
00741       evaluationVectorRight[2] = evaluationD;
00742 
00743       double minimumEvaluationRight = evaluationVectorRight.calculateMinimum();
00744 
00745       if((evaluationC <= evaluationD && evaluationB >= minimumEvaluationLeft)
00746       || (evaluationA <=  minimumEvaluationRight))
00747 
00748       // There is a minimum between a and b
00749       {
00750          b=d;
00751          d=c;
00752 
00753          evaluationB = evaluationD;
00754          evaluationD = evaluationC;
00755 
00756          // Set new c point
00757 
00758          c = a + tau*(b-a);
00759 
00760          // Calculate evaluation for new c
00761 
00762          potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*c;
00763 
00764          evaluationC = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00765       }
00766       else if((evaluationD <= evaluationC && evaluationA >= minimumEvaluationRight)
00767       || (evaluationB <= minimumEvaluationLeft))
00768 
00769       // There is a minimum between c and b
00770       {
00771          a = c;
00772          c = d;
00773 
00774          evaluationA = evaluationC;
00775          evaluationC = evaluationD;
00776 
00777          // Set new d point
00778 
00779          d = b - tau*(b-a);
00780 
00781          // Calculate evaluation for new d
00782 
00783          potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*d;
00784 
00785          evaluationD = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00786       }
00787       else
00788       {
00789          std::cerr << std::endl
00790                    << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
00791                    << "double calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate"
00792                    << "(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00793                    << "Unable to find were the minimum is." << std::endl;
00794 
00795          exit(1);
00796       }
00797    }
00798 
00799    // Get minimum evaluation and train rate among points A, B, C and D
00800 
00801    double minimumEvaluation = evaluation;
00802    trainRate = 0.0;
00803 
00804    if(evaluationA < minimumEvaluation)
00805    {
00806       minimumEvaluation  = evaluationA;
00807       trainRate = a;
00808    }
00809    else if(evaluationB < minimumEvaluation)
00810    {
00811       minimumEvaluation = evaluationB;
00812       trainRate = b;
00813    }
00814    else if(evaluationC < minimumEvaluation)
00815    {
00816       minimumEvaluation = evaluationC;
00817       trainRate = c;
00818    }
00819    else if(evaluationD < minimumEvaluation)
00820    {
00821       minimumEvaluation = evaluationD;
00822       trainRate = d;
00823    }
00824 
00825    return(trainRate);
00826 }
00827 
00828 
00829 // double calculateBrentMethodTrainRate(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>)
00830 // method
00831 
00842 
00843 double GradientDescent::calculateBrentMethodTrainRate(double initialTrainRate, 
00844 double evaluation, Vector<double> freeParameters, Vector<double> trainDirection)
00845 {
00846    double trainRate = 0.0;
00847 
00848    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00849 
00850    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
00851 
00852    Vector<double> potentialFreeParameters(numberOfFreeParameters);
00853 
00854    double a = 0.0;
00855    double evaluationA = evaluation;
00856    double b = 0.0;
00857    double evaluationB = evaluation;
00858 
00859    double u = 0.0;
00860    double evaluationU = evaluation;
00861    double v = 0.0;
00862    double evaluationV = evaluation;
00863    double w = 0.0;
00864    double evaluationW = evaluation;
00865    double x = 0.0;
00866    double evaluationX = evaluation;
00867 
00868    // Golden number
00869 
00870    double tau = (3.0-sqrt(5.0))/2.0; // 0.382
00871 
00872    // Start Brent search
00873 
00874    // Set initial a point
00875 
00876    a = 0.0;
00877 
00878    // Calculate evaluation for a
00879 
00880    evaluationA = evaluation;
00881 
00882    // Set initial b point
00883 
00884    b = initialTrainRate;
00885 
00886    // Calculate evaluation for b
00887 
00888    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*b;
00889 
00890    evaluationB = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00891 
00892    // Find initial interval where minimum evaluation occurs
00893 
00894    while(evaluationA > evaluationB)
00895    {
00896       // Reset a point and corresponding evaluation 
00897 
00898       a = b;
00899       evaluationA = evaluationB;
00900 
00901       // Set new b
00902 
00903       b *= bracketingFactor;
00904 
00905       if(b >= errorTrainRate)
00906       {
00907          std::cerr << std::endl
00908                    << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
00909                    << "double calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate"
00910                                    << "(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00911                    << "Unable to bracket a minimum." << std::endl;
00912                    
00913          exit(1);
00914       }
00915       else if(display && b >= warningTrainRate)
00916       {
00917          std::cout << std::endl
00918                    << "Flood Warning: Train rate is  " << b
00919                    << std::endl;
00920       }
00921 
00922       // Calculate evaluation for new b
00923 
00924       potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*b;
00925 
00926       evaluationB = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00927    }
00928 
00929    // Get inediate point V
00930 
00931    v = a + tau*(b-a);
00932 
00933    // Calculate evaluation for V
00934 
00935    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*v;
00936 
00937    evaluationV = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00938 
00939    // Set initial W and X points
00940 
00941    w = v;
00942    evaluationW = evaluationV;
00943 
00944    x = v;
00945    evaluationX = evaluationV;
00946 
00947    // Maximum and minimum intervals ???
00948 
00949    bool goldenSection = false;
00950 
00951    // Reduce the interval
00952 
00953    while(b-a > trainRateTolerance)
00954    {
00955       // Quadratic interpolation
00956 
00957       if(w != x && w != v && x != v) // Can construct parabola
00958       {
00959          // zz vector
00960 
00961          Vector<double> trainRateVector(3);
00962          trainRateVector[0] = v;
00963          trainRateVector[1] = w;
00964          trainRateVector[2] = x;
00965 
00966          std::sort(trainRateVector.begin(), trainRateVector.end(), std::less<double>());
00967 
00968          // pp vector
00969 
00970          Vector<double> evaluationVector(3);
00971 
00972          for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00973          {
00974             if(trainRateVector[i] == v)
00975             {
00976                evaluationVector[i] = evaluationV;
00977             }
00978             else if(trainRateVector[i] == w)
00979             {
00980                trainRateVector[i] = evaluationW;
00981             }
00982             else if(trainRateVector[i] == x)
00983             {
00984                trainRateVector[i] = evaluationX;
00985             }
00986             else
00987             {
00988                std::cerr << std::endl
00989                          << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
00990                          << "double calculateBrentMethodTrainRate" << std::endl
00991                          << "(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00992                          << "Unable to construct train rate and evaluation vectors right." << std::endl 
00993                          << std::endl;
00994 
00995                exit(1);
00996             }
00997          }
00998 
00999          // xStar is the minimum of the parabola through the three train rate points
01000 
01001          double numerator
01002          = (pow(trainRateVector[2],2) - pow(trainRateVector[1],2))*evaluationVector[0]
01003          + (pow(trainRateVector[1],2) - pow(trainRateVector[0],2))*evaluationVector[2]
01004          + (pow(trainRateVector[0],2) - pow(trainRateVector[2],2))*evaluationVector[1];
01005 
01006          double denominator
01007          = (trainRateVector[2] - trainRateVector[1])*evaluationVector[0]
01008          + (trainRateVector[1] - trainRateVector[0])*evaluationVector[2]
01009          + (trainRateVector[0] - trainRateVector[2])*evaluationVector[1];
01010 
01011          double xStar = 0.5*numerator/denominator;
01012 
01013          if(xStar < b && a < xStar) // xStar is in [a,b]
01014          {
01015             u = xStar;
01016 
01017             // Good, no need to perform golden section
01018 
01019             goldenSection = false;
01020          }
01021          else // xStar is not in [a,b]
01022          {
01023             // Bad, need to perform golden section
01024 
01025             goldenSection = true;
01026          }
01027       }
01028       else // Cannot construct parabola
01029       {
01030          // Bad, need to perform golden section
01031 
01032          goldenSection = true;
01033       }
01034 
01035       //
01036       // Golden section
01037       //
01038 
01039       if(goldenSection == true)
01040       {
01041          if(x >= (a+b)/2.0)
01042          {
01043             u = x-tau*(x-a);
01044          }
01045          else
01046          {
01047             u = x+tau*(b-x);
01048          }
01049       }
01050 
01051       // Calculate evaluation for U
01052 
01053       potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*u;
01054 
01055       evaluationU = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
01056 
01057       // Update points
01058 
01059       if(evaluationU <= evaluationX)
01060       {
01061          if(u < x)
01062          {
01063             b = x;
01064             evaluationB = evaluationX;
01065          }
01066          else
01067          {
01068             a = x;
01069             evaluationA = evaluationX;
01070          }
01071 
01072          v = w;
01073          evaluationV = evaluationW;
01074 
01075          w = x;
01076          evaluationW = evaluationX;
01077 
01078          x = u;
01079          evaluationX = evaluationU;
01080       }
01081       else
01082       {
01083          if(u < x)
01084          {
01085             a = u;
01086             evaluationA = evaluationU;
01087          }
01088          else
01089          {
01090             b = u;
01091             evaluationB = evaluationU;
01092          }
01093 
01094          if((evaluationU <= evaluationW) || (w == x))
01095          {
01096              v = w;
01097              evaluationV = evaluationW;
01098 
01099              w = u;
01100              evaluationW = evaluationU;
01101          }
01102          else if((evaluationU <= evaluationV) || (v == x) || (v == w))
01103          {
01104             v = u;
01105             evaluationV = evaluationU;
01106          }
01107       }
01108    } // while loop
01109 
01110    // Get minimum evaluation and train rate among points A, B, V, W and X
01111 
01112    double minimumEvaluation = evaluation;
01113    trainRate = 0.0;
01114 
01115    if(evaluationA < minimumEvaluation)
01116    {
01117       minimumEvaluation = evaluationA;
01118       trainRate = a;
01119    }
01120    else if(evaluationB < minimumEvaluation)
01121    {
01122       minimumEvaluation = evaluationB;
01123       trainRate = b;
01124    }
01125    else if(evaluationU < minimumEvaluation)
01126    {
01127       minimumEvaluation = evaluationU;
01128       trainRate = u;
01129    }
01130    else if(evaluationV < minimumEvaluation)
01131    {
01132       minimumEvaluation = evaluationV;
01133       trainRate = v;
01134    }
01135    else if(evaluationW < minimumEvaluation)
01136    {
01137       minimumEvaluation = evaluationW;
01138       trainRate = w;
01139    }
01140    else if(evaluationX < minimumEvaluation)
01141    {
01142       minimumEvaluation = evaluationX;
01143       trainRate = x;
01144    }
01145 
01146    return(trainRate);
01147 }
01148 
01149 
01150 // void train(void) method
01151 
01157 
01158 void GradientDescent::train(void)
01159 {
01160    // Control sentence (if debug)
01161 
01162    #ifndef NDEBUG 
01163 
01164    if(objectiveFunctional == NULL)
01165    {
01166       std::cerr << std::endl
01167                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
01168                 << "void train(void) method." << std::endl
01169                 << "Pointer to objective functional object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
01170                 << std::endl;
01171 
01172       exit(1);
01173    }
01174 
01175    #endif
01176 
01177    // Multilayer perceptron stuff
01178 
01179    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
01180 
01181    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
01182 
01183    resizeTrainingHistory(maximumNumberOfEpochs+1);
01184 
01185    // Free parameters
01186 
01187    Vector<double> freeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getFreeParameters();
01188 
01189    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
01190    {
01191       freeParametersHistory.setRow(0, freeParameters);                                
01192    }
01193 
01194    // Free parameters norm
01195 
01196    double freeParametersNorm = freeParameters.calculateNorm();
01197 
01198    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
01199    {
01200       freeParametersNormHistory[0] = freeParametersNorm; 
01201    }
01202 
01203    if(display && (freeParametersNorm >= warningFreeParametersNorm))
01204    {
01205       std::cout << "Flood Warning: Initial free parameters norm is " << freeParametersNorm << "." << std::endl;          
01206    }
01207    
01208    // Training time stuff
01209 
01210    time_t beginningTime, currentTime;
01211    double elapsedTime = 0.0;
01212 
01213    // Start training 
01214 
01215    time(&beginningTime);
01216 
01217    if(display)
01218    {
01219       std::cout << std::endl
01220                 << "Training with gradient descent..." 
01221                 << std::endl;
01222    }
01223    
01224    // Initial evaluation
01225    
01226    double evaluation = objectiveFunctional->calculateEvaluation();
01227 
01228    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
01229    {
01230       evaluationHistory[0] = evaluation;                                
01231    }
01232 
01233    // Initial objective function gradient
01234 
01235    Vector<double> gradient = objectiveFunctional->calculateGradient();
01236 
01237    if(reserveGradientHistory)
01238    {
01239       gradientHistory.setRow(0, gradient);                                
01240    }
01241 
01242    // Initial gradient norm
01243 
01244    double gradientNorm = gradient.calculateNorm();
01245 
01246    if(display && (gradientNorm >= warningGradientNorm))
01247    {
01248       std::cout << "Flood Warning: Initial gradient norm is " << gradientNorm << "." << std::endl;          
01249    }
01250 
01251    // Free parameters history 
01252 
01253    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
01254    {
01255       freeParametersHistory.setRow(0, freeParameters);   
01256    }
01257 
01258    // Evaluation history
01259 
01260    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
01261    {
01262       evaluationHistory[0] = evaluation;
01263    }
01264 
01265    // Gradient norm history
01266    
01267    if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
01268    {
01269       gradientNormHistory[0] = gradientNorm;
01270    }
01271 
01272    if(display && (gradientNorm >= warningGradientNorm))
01273    {
01274       std::cout << "Flood Warning: Initial gradient norm is " << gradientNorm << "." << std::endl;          
01275    }
01276 
01277    // Elapsed time
01278 
01279    time(&currentTime);
01280    elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01281 
01282    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
01283    {
01284       elapsedTimeHistory[0] = elapsedTime;
01285    }
01286 
01287    // Stopping criteria
01288 
01289    if(evaluation <= evaluationGoal)
01290    {
01291       if(display)
01292       {          
01293          std::cout << std::endl
01294                    << "Initial evaluation is less than goal." << std::endl;
01295 
01296          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01297          std::cout << "Initial parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01298          std::cout << "Initial evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;          
01299          std::cout << "Initial gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01300 
01301          objectiveFunctional->print();
01302       }
01303  
01304       resizeTrainingHistory(1);
01305       
01306       return;
01307    }
01308    else if(gradientNorm <= gradientNormGoal)
01309    {  
01310       if(display)
01311       {        
01312          std::cout << std::endl
01313                    << "Initial gradient norm is less than goal." << std::endl;
01314 
01315          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01316          std::cout << "Initial parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01317          std::cout << "Initial evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01318          std::cout << "Initial gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01319 
01320          objectiveFunctional->print();
01321       }
01322 
01323       resizeTrainingHistory(1);
01324 
01325       return;
01326    }
01327    else
01328    {
01329       if(display)
01330       {
01331          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01332          std::cout << "Initial parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01333          std::cout << "Initial evaluation: " <<  evaluation << std::endl;
01334          std::cout << "Initial gradient norm: " <<  gradientNorm << std::endl;      
01335 
01336          objectiveFunctional->print();
01337       }
01338    }
01339 
01340    // Initialize tain direction vector
01341 
01342    Vector<double> trainDirection(numberOfFreeParameters);
01343 
01344    double trainDirectionNorm = 0.0;
01345 
01346    // Initialize train rate stuff
01347 
01348    double initialTrainRate = 0.0;
01349    double trainRate = 0.0;
01350    double oldTrainRate = 0.0;
01351 
01352    // Main loop
01353 
01354    for(int epoch = 1; epoch <= maximumNumberOfEpochs; epoch++)
01355    {
01356       // Get train direction
01357 
01358       trainDirection = gradient*(-1.0);
01359 
01360       if(reserveTrainingDirectionHistory)
01361       {
01362          trainingDirectionHistory.setRow(epoch-1, trainDirection);                     
01363       }
01364       
01365       // Train direction norm
01366       
01367       trainDirectionNorm = trainDirection.calculateNorm();
01368       
01369       if(reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory)
01370       {
01371          trainingDirectionNormHistory[epoch-1] = trainDirectionNorm; 
01372       }
01373       
01374       // Get initial train rate
01375 
01376       if(epoch == 1)
01377       {
01378          initialTrainRate = firstTrainRate;
01379       }
01380       else
01381       {
01382          initialTrainRate = oldTrainRate;
01383       }
01384     
01385       // Get train rate
01386 
01387       switch(trainRateMethod)
01388       {
01389          case Fixed:
01390 
01391             trainRate = firstTrainRate;
01392 
01393             break;
01394 
01395          case GoldenSection:
01396 
01397             trainRate = calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate
01398             (initialTrainRate, evaluation, freeParameters, trainDirection);
01399 
01400             break;
01401 
01402          case BrentMethod:
01403 
01404             trainRate = calculateBrentMethodTrainRate
01405             (initialTrainRate, evaluation, freeParameters, trainDirection);
01406 
01407          break;
01408       }
01409 
01410       if(reserveTrainingRateHistory)
01411       {
01412          trainingRateHistory[epoch-1] = trainRate;
01413       }
01414 
01415       // Train rate stopping criteria
01416 
01417       if(trainRate == 0.0)
01418       {
01419          if(display)
01420          {
01421             std::cout << std::endl
01422                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01423                       << "Train rate is zero." << std::endl;
01424 
01425             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01426             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01427             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01428             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01429 
01430             objectiveFunctional->print();
01431          }
01432 
01433          resizeTrainingHistory(epoch);
01434 
01435          break;
01436       }
01437 
01438       // Get new free parameters
01439 
01440       freeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*trainRate;
01441 
01442       // Set new free parameters
01443 
01444       multilayerPerceptron->setFreeParameters(freeParameters);
01445 
01446       // Free parameters history 
01447 
01448      if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
01449      {
01450       freeParametersHistory.setRow(epoch, freeParameters);
01451      }
01452 
01453       freeParametersNorm = freeParameters.calculateNorm();
01454 
01455       if(display && (freeParametersNorm >= warningFreeParametersNorm))
01456       {
01457          std::cout << "Flood Warning: Free parameters norm is " << freeParametersNorm << "." << std::endl;          
01458       }
01459       
01460      if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
01461      {
01462       freeParametersNormHistory[epoch] = freeParametersNorm;
01463      }
01464       
01465       // Objective function evaluation
01466 
01467      double oldEvaluation = evaluation;
01468    
01469       evaluation = objectiveFunctional->calculateEvaluation();
01470 
01471      if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
01472      {
01473       evaluationHistory[epoch] = evaluation;
01474      }
01475 
01476       // Objective function gradient
01477 
01478       gradient = objectiveFunctional->calculateGradient();
01479 
01480      if(reserveGradientHistory)
01481      {
01482       gradientHistory.setRow(epoch, gradient);
01483      }
01484 
01485       // Gradient norm
01486 
01487       gradientNorm = gradient.calculateNorm();
01488 
01489       if(display && (gradientNorm >= warningGradientNorm))
01490       {
01491          std::cout << "Flood Warning: Gradient norm is " << gradientNorm << "." << std::endl;          
01492       }
01493 
01494      if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
01495      {
01496       gradientNormHistory[epoch] = gradientNorm;
01497      }
01498 
01499       // Elapsed time
01500 
01501       time(&currentTime);
01502       elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01503 
01504       if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
01505       {
01506          elapsedTimeHistory[epoch] = elapsedTime;                             
01507       }
01508      
01509       // Stopping Criteria
01510 
01511       // Evaluation goal 
01512 
01513       if(evaluation <= evaluationGoal)
01514       {
01515          if(display)
01516          {
01517             std::cout << std::endl
01518                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01519                       << "Evaluation goal reached." << std::endl;
01520 
01521             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01522             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01523             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01524             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01525 
01526             objectiveFunctional->print();
01527          }
01528 
01529          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);
01530 
01531          break;
01532       }
01533 
01534       // Gradient norm goal 
01535 
01536       if(gradientNorm <= gradientNormGoal)
01537       {
01538          if(display)
01539          {
01540             std::cout << std::endl
01541                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01542                       << "Gradient norm goal reached."
01543                       << std::endl;  
01544 
01545             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01546             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01547             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01548             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01549 
01550             objectiveFunctional->print();
01551          }
01552 
01553          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);
01554  
01555          break;
01556       }
01557 
01558       // Minimum evaluation improvement 
01559 
01560       double improvement = fabs(evaluation - oldEvaluation);
01561 
01562       if(improvement <= minimumImprovement)
01563       {
01564          if(display)
01565          {
01566             std::cout << std::endl
01567                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01568                       << "Minimum evaluation improvement reached."
01569                       << std::endl;
01570 
01571             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01572             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01573             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01574             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01575 
01576             objectiveFunctional->print();
01577          }
01578 
01579          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);
01580 
01581        break;
01582       }
01583 
01584       // Maximum optimization time
01585 
01586       time(&currentTime);
01587 
01588       elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01589 
01590       if(elapsedTime >= maximumTime)
01591       {
01592          if(display)
01593          {
01594             std::cout << std::endl
01595                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01596                       << "Maximum training time reached."
01597                       << std::endl;
01598 
01599             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01600             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01601             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01602             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01603 
01604             objectiveFunctional->print();
01605          }
01606 
01607          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);
01608 
01609          break;
01610       }
01611 
01612       // Maximum number of epochs
01613 
01614       if(epoch == maximumNumberOfEpochs)
01615       {
01616          if(display)
01617          {
01618             std::cout << std::endl
01619                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01620                       << "Maximum number of epochs reached."
01621                       << std::endl;
01622 
01623             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01624             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01625             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01626             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01627 
01628             objectiveFunctional->print();
01629          }
01630 
01631           break;
01632       }
01633 
01634       // Progress
01635 
01636       if(display && epoch % displayPeriod == 0)
01637       {
01638          std::cout << std::endl
01639                    << "Epoch " << epoch << ";" << std::endl;
01640 
01641          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << ";" << std::endl;
01642          std::cout << "Free parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01643          std::cout << "Evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01644          std::cout << "Gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01645          
01646          objectiveFunctional->print();
01647       }
01648 
01649       // Update
01650 
01651       oldTrainRate = trainRate;
01652    } 
01653 }
01654

01696 
01697 void GradientDescent::print(void)
01698 {
01699    std::cout << std::endl
01700              << "Gradient Descent Object." << std::endl;
01701 
01702    // Training operators
01703 
01704    // Train rate method
01705 
01706    std::cout << "Train rate method:" << std::endl;
01707 
01708    switch(trainRateMethod)
01709    {
01710       case Fixed:
01711 
01712          std::cout << "Fixed" << std::endl;
01713 
01714       break;
01715 
01716       case GoldenSection:
01717 
01718          std::cout << "Golden section" << std::endl;
01719 
01720       break;
01721 
01722       case BrentMethod:
01723 
01724          std::cout << "Brent Method" << std::endl;
01725 
01726       break;
01727    }
01728 
01729 
01730    // Training parameters
01731 
01732    std::cout << "First train rate: " << std::endl
01733              << firstTrainRate << std::endl
01734              << "Train rate tolerance: " << std::endl
01735              << trainRateTolerance << std::endl;
01736 
01737    // Stopping criteria
01738 
01739    std::cout << "Evaluation goal:" << std::endl
01740              << evaluationGoal << std::endl
01741              << "Gradient norm goal:" << std::endl
01742              << gradientNormGoal << std::endl
01743              << "Maximum time:" << std::endl
01744              << maximumTime << std::endl 
01745              << "Maximum number of epochs:" << std::endl
01746              << maximumNumberOfEpochs << std::endl; 
01747 
01748    // User stuff
01749 
01750    std::cout << "Warning train rate:" << std::endl
01751              << warningTrainRate << std::endl
01752              << "Error train rate:" << std::endl
01753              << errorTrainRate << std::endl
01754              << "Display:" << std::endl
01755              << display << std::endl
01756              << "Display period:" << std::endl
01757              << displayPeriod << std::endl;
01758 
01759    std::cout << "Reserve elapsed time history:" << std::endl
01760              << reserveElapsedTimeHistory << std::endl 
01761              << "Reserve free parameters history:" << std::endl
01762              << reserveFreeParametersHistory << std::endl 
01763              << "Reserve free parameters norm history:" << std::endl
01764              << reserveFreeParametersNormHistory << std::endl 
01765              << "Reserve evaluation history:" << std::endl
01766              << reserveEvaluationHistory << std::endl 
01767              << "Reserve gradient history:" << std::endl
01768              << reserveGradientHistory << std::endl 
01769              << "Reserve gradient norm history:" << std::endl
01770              << reserveGradientNormHistory << std::endl 
01771              << "Reserve training direction history:" << std::endl
01772              << reserveTrainingDirectionHistory << std::endl 
01773              << "Reserve training direction norm history:" << std::endl
01774              << reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory << std::endl 
01775              << "Reserve training rate history:"  << std::endl
01776              << reserveTrainingRateHistory << std::endl;
01777 
01778 }

01781 // void save(char*) method
01782 
01824 
01825 void GradientDescent::save(char* filename)
01826 {
01827    // File
01828 
01829    std::fstream file;
01830 
01831    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
01832 
01833    if(!file.is_open())
01834    {
01835       std::cerr << std::endl 
01836                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
01837                 << "void save(char*) method." << std::endl
01838                 << "Cannot open gradient descent object data file."  << std::endl
01839                 << std::endl;
01840 
01841       exit(1);
01842    }
01843    else
01844    {
01845       if(display)
01846       {
01847          std::cout << std::endl
01848                    << "Saving gradient descent object to data file..." << std::endl;
01849       }
01850    }
01851 
01852    // Write file header
01853 
01854 
01855    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Gradient Descent Object." << std::endl;
01856 
01857 
01858    // Training operators
01859 
01860    // Train direction method
01861 
01862    // Train rate method
01863 
01864    file << "TrainRateMethod:" << std::endl;
01865 
01866    switch(trainRateMethod)
01867    {
01868       case Fixed:
01869 
01870       file << "Fixed" << std::endl;
01871 
01872       break;
01873 
01874       case GoldenSection:
01875 
01876       file << "GoldenSection" << std::endl;
01877 
01878       break;
01879 
01880       case BrentMethod:
01881 
01882       file << "BrentMethod" << std::endl;
01883 
01884       break;
01885    }
01886 
01887    // Training parameters
01888 
01889    file << "FirstTrainRate:" << std::endl
01890         << firstTrainRate << std::endl
01891         << "TrainRateTolerance:" << std::endl
01892         << trainRateTolerance << std::endl;
01893 
01894 
01895    // Stopping criteria
01896 
01897    file << "EvaluationGoal:" << std::endl
01898         << evaluationGoal << std::endl
01899         << "GradientNormGoal:" << std::endl
01900         << gradientNormGoal << std::endl
01901         << "MaximumTime: " << std::endl
01902         << maximumTime << std::endl
01903         << "MaximumNumberOfEpochs: " << std::endl
01904         << maximumNumberOfEpochs << std::endl;
01905 
01906    // User stuff
01907 
01908    file << "WarningTrainRate:" << std::endl
01909         << warningTrainRate << std::endl
01910         << "ErrorTrainRate:" << std::endl
01911         << errorTrainRate << std::endl
01912         << "Display:" << std::endl
01913         << display << std::endl
01914         << "DisplayPeriod:" << std::endl
01915         << displayPeriod << std::endl;
01916 
01917    file << "ReserveElapsedTimeHistory:" << std::endl
01918         << reserveElapsedTimeHistory << std::endl 
01919         << "ReserveFreeParametersHistory:" << std::endl
01920         << reserveFreeParametersHistory << std::endl 
01921         << "ReserveFreeParametersNormHistory:" << std::endl
01922         << reserveFreeParametersNormHistory << std::endl 
01923         << "ReserveEvaluationHistory:" << std::endl
01924         << reserveEvaluationHistory << std::endl 
01925         << "ReserveGradientHistory:" << std::endl
01926         << reserveGradientHistory << std::endl 
01927         << "ReserveGradientNormHistory:" << std::endl
01928         << reserveGradientNormHistory << std::endl 
01929         << "ReserveTrainingDirectionHistory:" << std::endl
01930         << reserveTrainingDirectionHistory << std::endl 
01931         << "ReserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory:" << std::endl
01932         << reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory << std::endl 
01933         << "ReserveTrainingRateHistory:"  << std::endl
01934         << reserveTrainingRateHistory << std::endl;
01935 
01936    file.close();
01937 }

01940 // void load(char*) method
01941 
01984 
01985 void GradientDescent::load(char* filename)
01986 {
01987    std::string word;
01988 
01989    // File
01990 
01991    std::fstream file;
01992 
01993    file.open(filename, std::ios::in);
01994 
01995    if(!file.is_open())
01996    {
01997       std::cerr << std::endl
01998                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
01999                 << "void load(char*) method."
02000                 << std::endl
02001                 << "Cannot open gradient descent object data file."  << std::endl;
02002 
02003       exit(1);
02004    }
02005    else
02006    {
02007       if(display)
02008       { 
02009          std::cout << std::endl
02010                    << "Loading gradient descent object from data file..."
02011                    << std::endl;
02012       }
02013    }
02014 
02015    // Train rate method
02016 
02017    file >> word;
02018 
02019    file >> word;
02020 
02021    if(word == "Fixed")
02022    {
02023       trainRateMethod = Fixed;
02024    }
02025    else if(word == "GoldenSection")
02026    {
02027       trainRateMethod = GoldenSection;
02028    }
02029    else if(word == "BrentMethod")
02030    {
02031       trainRateMethod = BrentMethod;
02032    }
02033    else
02034    {
02035       std::cerr << std::endl
02036                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
02037                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02038                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02039 
02040       exit(1);   
02041    }
02042 
02043    // Training parameters
02044 
02045    // First train rate
02046 
02047    file >> word;
02048 
02049    if(word != "FirstTrainRate:")
02050    {
02051       std::cerr << std::endl
02052                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
02053                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02054                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02055 
02056       exit(1);   
02057    }
02058 
02059    file >> firstTrainRate;
02060 
02061    // Tolerance
02062 
02063    file >> word;
02064 
02065    if(word != "TrainRateTolerance:")
02066    {
02067       std::cerr << std::endl
02068                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
02069                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02070                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02071 
02072       exit(1);   
02073    }
02074 
02075    file >> trainRateTolerance;
02076 
02077    // Stopping criteria: 
02078 
02079    // Evaluation goal
02080 
02081    file >> word;
02082 
02083    if(word != "EvaluationGoal:")
02084    {
02085       std::cerr << std::endl
02086                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
02087                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02088                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02089 
02090       exit(1);   
02091    }
02092 
02093    file >> evaluationGoal;
02094    
02095    // Gradient norm goal
02096 
02097    file >> word;
02098 
02099    if(word != "GradientNormGoal:")
02100    {
02101       std::cerr << std::endl
02102                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
02103                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02104                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02105 
02106       exit(1);   
02107    }
02108 
02109    file >> gradientNormGoal;
02110 
02111    // Maximum time
02112 
02113    file >> word;
02114 
02115    if(word != "MaximumTime:")
02116    {
02117       std::cerr << std::endl
02118                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
02119                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02120                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02121 
02122       exit(1);   
02123    }
02124 
02125    file >> maximumTime;
02126 
02127    // Maximum number of epochs
02128 
02129    file >> word;
02130 
02131    if(word != "MaximumNumberOfEpochs:")
02132    {
02133       std::cerr << std::endl
02134                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
02135                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02136                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02137 
02138       exit(1);   
02139    }
02140 
02141    file >> maximumNumberOfEpochs;
02142 
02143    // User stuff: 
02144 
02145    // Warning train rate
02146 
02147    file >> word;
02148 
02149    if(word != "WarningTrainRate:")
02150    {
02151       std::cerr << std::endl
02152                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
02153                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02154                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02155 
02156       exit(1);   
02157    }
02158 
02159    file >> warningTrainRate;
02160 
02161    // Error train rate
02162

02164 
02165    if(word != "ErrorTrainRate:")
02166    {
02167       std::cerr << std::endl
02168                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
02169                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02170                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02171 
02172       exit(1);   
02173    }
02174 
02175    file >> errorTrainRate;
02176

02178 
02179    file >> word;
02180 
02181    if(word != "Display:")
02182    {
02183       std::cerr << std::endl
02184                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
02185                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02186                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02187 
02188       exit(1);   
02189    }
02190

02192

02202                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02203 
02204       exit(1);   
02205    }
02206

02208 
02209    // Reserve elapsed time history
02210 
02211    file >> word;
02212 
02213    if(word != "ReserveElapsedTimeHistory:")
02214    {
02215       std::cerr << std::endl
02216                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
02217                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02218                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02219

02231       std::cerr << std::endl

02235

02237    }
02238

02358 
02359 // void resizeTrainingHistory(int) method
02360 
02376 
02377 void GradientDescent::resizeTrainingHistory(int newSize)
02378 {
02379    // Elapsed time history vector
02380 
02381    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
02382    {
02383       elapsedTimeHistory.resize(newSize);
02384    }
02385 
02386    // Free parameters history matrix
02387 
02388    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
02389    {
02390       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02391                                         
02392       int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
02393                                    
02394       freeParametersHistory.resize(newSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
02395    }
02396 
02397    // Free parameters norm history vector
02398 
02399    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
02400    {
02401       freeParametersNormHistory.resize(newSize);
02402    }
02403 
02404    // Evaluation history vector
02405 
02406    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
02407    {
02408       evaluationHistory.resize(newSize);
02409    }
02410 
02411    // Gradient history matrix
02412 
02413    if(reserveGradientHistory)
02414    {
02415       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02416                                         
02417       int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
02418 
02419       gradientHistory.resize(newSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
02420    }
02421  
02422    // Gradient norm history vector
02423 
02424    if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
02425    {
02426       gradientNormHistory.resize(newSize);
02427    }
02428 
02429    // Training direction history matrix
02430 
02431    if(reserveTrainingDirectionHistory)
02432    {
02433       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02434                                         
02435       int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
02436 
02437       trainingDirectionHistory.resize(newSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
02438    }
02439 
02440    // Training direction norm history vector
02441 
02442    if(reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory)
02443    {
02444       trainingDirectionNormHistory.resize(newSize);
02445    }
02446 
02447    // Training rate history vector
02448 
02449    if(reserveTrainingRateHistory)
02450    {
02451       trainingRateHistory.resize(newSize);
02452    }
02453 }
02454 
02455 
02456 // void saveTrainingHistory(char*) method
02457 
02461 
02462 void GradientDescent::saveTrainingHistory(char* filename)
02463 
02464 {
02465    std::fstream file; 
02466 
02467    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
02468 
02469    // Write file header 
02470 
02471    if(!file.is_open())
02472    {
02473       std::cerr << std::endl 
02474                 << "Flood Error: GradientDescent class." << std::endl
02475                 << "void saveTrainingHistory(char*) method." << std::endl
02476                 << "Cannot open training history data file." << std::endl
02477                 << std::endl;
02478 
02479       exit(1);
02480    }
02481    else
02482    {
02483       if(display)
02484       {
02485          std::cout << std::endl 
02486                    << "Saving training history to data file..." << std::endl;
02487       }
02488    }
02489 
02490    // Write file header
02491 
02492    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Gradient Descent Training History." << std::endl;
02493 
02494    // Write file data
02495 
02496    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
02497    {
02498       file << "ElapsedTimeHistory:" << std::endl;
02499       file << elapsedTimeHistory << std::endl;      
02500    }
02501    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
02502    {
02503       file << "FreeParametersHistory:" << std::endl;
02504       file << freeParametersHistory << std::endl;      
02505    }
02506    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
02507    {
02508       file << "FreeParametersNormHistory:" << std::endl;
02509       file << freeParametersHistory << std::endl;      
02510    }
02511    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
02512    {
02513       file << "EvaluationHistory:" << std::endl;
02514       file << evaluationHistory << std::endl;      
02515    }
02516    if(reserveGradientHistory)
02517    {
02518       file << "GradientHistory:" << std::endl;
02519       file << gradientHistory << std::endl;      
02520    }
02521    if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
02522    {
02523       file << "GradientNormHistory:" << std::endl;
02524       file << gradientNormHistory << std::endl;      
02525    }
02526    if(reserveTrainingDirectionHistory)
02527    {
02528       file << "TrainingDirectionHistory:" << std::endl;
02529       file << trainingDirectionHistory << std::endl;      
02530    }
02531    if(reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory)
02532    {
02533       file << "TrainingDirectionNormHistory:" << std::endl;
02534       file << trainingDirectionNormHistory << std::endl;      
02535    }
02536    if(reserveTrainingRateHistory)
02537    {
02538       file << "TrainingRateHistory:" << std::endl;
02539       file << trainingRateHistory << std::endl;      
02540    }
02541 
02542    file.close();     
02543      
02544 }
